1.0.2 (2016-09-15)
++++++++++++++++++

* Avoid quoting any numeric types when using ``QUOTE_NONNUMERIC``.
  _ thanks to @torfsen for the bug report

++++++++++++++++++

* Better error messages for invalid dialects.
  - thanks to @kengruven for the bug report

* Initial Release
